dict.acceptation: 辅助，服侍；执行牧师职务；

sent.orig: This week both the defence minister and the minister for unification offered to resign.
sent.trans: 本周，韩国国防部长和统一部长官都提出了辞职。

sent.orig: Mr Yanukovich chose Mykola Azarov, a Russian aide and former finance minister, as his prime minister.
sent.trans: 亚努科维奇选择俄罗斯裔亲信，前任财政部长阿扎罗夫作为他的总理。

sent.orig: A Cabinet Minister a MP chosen by the Prime Minister to run a federal government departments.
sent.trans: 内阁议员是被总理拣选出来管理联邦政府部门的国会议员。

sent.orig: The education minister personally persuaded the prime minister to rethink.
sent.trans: 教育部长亲自劝首相再考虑一下。
